member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Utilities.Constants
member.summary: The see> class contains static / constant properties to simplify and centralise various settings

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Utilities.Constants.WebDeserialisationSettings
member.summary: Returns an instance of configured with the Web defaults

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Utilities.EncryptionExtensions
member.summary: The class contains extension methods to encrypt / decrypt the specified string

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.EncryptionExtensions.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The Encrypt extension method will encrypt the specified string (using AES encryption)
member.param: The string to encrypt
The optional key to use for the encryption. If supplied, it must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long. If not specified, an internal default (32 bytes) will be used
The optional iv (initialisation vector) to use for the decryption. If supplied, it must be 16 bytes long. If not specified, an internal default will be used

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.EncryptionExtensions.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The Decrypt extension method will encrypt the specified string (using AES encryption)
member.param: The string to decrypt
The optional key to use for the encryption. If supplied, it must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long. If not specified, an internal default (32 bytes) will be used
The optional iv (initialisation vector) to use for the decryption. If supplied, it must be 16 bytes long. If not specified, an internal default will be used

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.EnumExtensions.ParseEnum``1(System.String)
member.summary: The ParseEnum method will parse the supplied string and return the matching enum value
member.typeparam: The typeof of the expected enum
member.param: The value to parse to the enum
member.returns: The parsed value as the matching enum value
member.exception: Thrown when the string is not a valid enum value

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.FileInfoExtensions.IsImage(System.IO.Abstractions.IFileInfo)
member.summary: The IsImage method returns whether the represents a supported image type
member.param: The being extended
member.returns: true if the represents a supported image type. Otherwise, false

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Utilities.ObjectExtensions
member.summary: The class contains some useful methods to enable various tasks to be performed in a more fluid, English sentence, style

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.ObjectExtensions.ToJson``1(``0)
member.summary: The ToJson method, as you might expect, converts the supplied objectToJson to its JSON equivalent (using the JsonSerializerDefaults.Web defaults with WriteIndented set to true)
member.param: The objectToJson to convert to JSON
member.returns: The JSON string of the objectToJson supplied

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.RegexExtensions.LowercaseLettersRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-z]+$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z] atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.RegexExtensions.UppercaseLettersRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[A-Z]+$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z] atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.RegexExtensions.DigitRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[A-Z]+$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z] atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Utilities.RegexExtensions.SpecialCharacterRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[!-\\/:-@[-`{-~]
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [!-/:-@[-`{-~].

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Utilities.StringExtensions
